text: Bellingham Bridge is a stone bridge across the River North Tyne at Bellingham in Northumberland. ==History== The bridge, which has four stone arches, was built by John Green and completed in 1834. It is a Grade II listed structure. ==References== Category:Bridges in Northumberland Category:Crossings of the River Tyne Category:Grade II listed bridges Category:Grade II listed buildings in Northumberland
title: Bellingham Bridge
